mapper.select: SELECT t.tcode, op.ocode, op.scode, op.name, op.img, op.ea, op.price, t.tradate FROM transaction t, (SELECT o.ocode, o.tcode, o.scode, p.name, p.img, o.ea, o.price FROM orderlist o, productinfo p WHERE o.scode = p.scode) op WHERE t.tcode = op.tcode AND t.trastatus = 0 AND t.acode = #{acode}
SELECT tcode FROM transaction WHERE trastatus = 0 AND acode = #{acode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tcode, acode, tradate, trastatus) VALUES (TRANSACTION_SEQ, #{acode}, sysdate, 0)
INSERT INTO orderlist(ocode, tcode, scode, ea, price) VALUES (ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tcode}, #{scode}, #{ea}, #{price})
